stories: Geopolitics: U.S. + Israel launch major strikes on Iran; retaliation signals rise
Oil supply response: OPEC+ may consider a larger output hike after the Iran strikes
Trade-policy shock: Supreme Court scraps $133B in Trump-era tariffs; refunds may lag
Defense-AI vendor regime flips: OpenAI lands Pentagon deal as Anthropic is blacklisted
Media M&A: Paramount Skydance agrees to buy Warner Bros. Discovery for $31/share (all-cash)
Mega-liquidity catalyst: SpaceX said to prep confidential IPO filing as soon as March
Crypto plumbing: Morgan Stanley applies for a bank charter to custody crypto assets
Alpha (capital return): Prothena authorizes a $100M share repurchase ($PRTA)
Alpha (capital structure): Fold extinguishes $66.3M of convertible notes ($FLD)
Wildcard (regulatory overhang eases): Federal court blocks Virginia’s under-16 social media restrictions
